frontmatter.title: Hosted SMS Messaging
frontmatter.metaTitle: What is Hosted SMS Messaging on A2P Phone Numbers?

mdx.body:
Hosted Messaging, also known as Hosted SMS, allows you to either migrate over or enable SMS and MMS text messaging services on your existing [application-to-person (A2P) phone numbers](https://www.telgorithm.com/glossary/application-to-person-messaging-a2p/).

In other words, if you’re really happy with your API provider’s voice services but want better messaging services, you can stay with your current provider for voice and have your messaging hosted by another provider on those very same numbers concurrently.

## What is Hosted SMS?

Hosted SMS is a service that enables businesses to add SMS and MMS capabilities to their existing phone numbers without changing their current voice service provider. This means you can continue to use your trusted voice services while enhancing your messaging capabilities through a different provider.

## How does Hosted SMS differ from traditional SMS services?

Hosted SMS allows you to use your existing A2P phone numbers for messaging without needing to switch providers for voice services. Traditional SMS services typically require using a single provider for both voice and messaging, which may not offer the best capabilities for both services.

## What are the benefits of using Hosted SMS?

Hosted SMS offers several advantages, including cost savings, improved reliability, and access to advanced messaging features. It also provides flexibility, allowing you to choose the best providers for both voice and messaging services.

## How do I migrate my current messaging services to a Hosted SMS provider?

Migrating to a Hosted SMS provider is straightforward. You can either enable SMS and MMS services on your current A2P phone numbers or port your existing numbers to the new provider. The process involves minimal disruption and ensures a smooth transition.

## Can I keep my existing phone numbers when switching to Hosted SMS?

Yes, you can keep your existing phone numbers. Telgorithm's [Automated Number Porting](https://www.telgorithm.com/glossary/automated-number-porting/) feature allows you to port active or existing phone numbers from another API provider to Telgorithm instantly and in bulk. This ensures that your customers experience no interruptions during the transition.

## What are the costs associated with Hosted SMS?

The costs for Hosted SMS vary depending on the provider and the specific services you need. Typically, there may be setup fees, monthly charges, and usage costs. It's essential to review the pricing model of your chosen provider to understand the total cost. You can review Telgorithm’s pricing [here](https://www.telgorithm.com/pricing/). 

## Is Hosted SMS secure?

Security is a top priority for Hosted SMS providers. They implement robust security measures to protect your messages and customer data, ensuring that your communication remains confidential and secure.

## What kind of support is available for Hosted SMS services?

Telgorithm offers comprehensive support for their Hosted Messaging services. Their team of experts is available to assist you throughout the migration process and beyond, ensuring that you have the help you need whenever you need it.

## How reliable is Hosted SMS compared to other messaging solutions?

Hosted SMS is highly reliable, with providers like Telgorithm offering excellent uptime and deliverability. This ensures that your messages are delivered promptly and reliably.

## Can Hosted SMS services be integrated with my existing systems?

Yes, Hosted SMS services can be easily integrated with your existing systems. Telgorithm's API allows for seamless integration, enabling you to add messaging capabilities to your current setup without any major changes.

## Are there any limitations or restrictions with Hosted SMS?

While Hosted SMS offers many benefits, there may be some limitations, such as message volume caps or geographic restrictions. It's essential to check with your provider to understand any potential limitations.

## What are the typical use cases for Hosted SMS?

Hosted SMS is used across various industries for customer communication, marketing campaigns, appointment reminders, and more. It's a versatile solution that can enhance your business's communication strategy.

## How does Hosted SMS handle delivery and receipt of messages?

Hosted SMS services manage message delivery through reliable networks, ensuring that your messages reach their intended recipients. They also provide delivery reports and handle undelivered messages effectively.

## What kind of reporting and analytics are available with Hosted SMS?

Telgorithm offers robust reporting and analytics tools, allowing you to monitor and optimize your messaging campaigns. These tools provide insights into message delivery, response rates, and other key metrics.

## Can Hosted SMS support both SMS and MMS messages?

Yes, Hosted SMS supports both SMS and MMS messages, allowing you to send text and multimedia messages to your customers.

To learn more about hosting your text messaging services on Telgorithm's portal, [reach out](https://www.telgorithm.com/contact-us/) to our team of experts today! They are ready to assist you in enhancing your communication capabilities with Hosted Messaging.
